Light track Description: Met Sam in Milan a few weeks ago, and he gave me this beautiful acid-etched metal-plated CD - Diathomee. I love when 'real' musicians produce electronic music - this sounds like live recording. RIYL Hesaitix, the new JASSS, trip-hop, illbient.
Heavy track Description: Each Friday, Neurot records (run by Neurosis) offers an LP as a pay-what-you-want download. That's how I can across Grey Daturas. Perfect for my current 2000s noise/heavy psych obsession. RIYL guitars, Yellow Swans, feedback, overdrive.

Light track Description: one of the most beautiful track i've ever had to listen to. it instantly connects me with myself and delivers me a deep feeling of belonging to something way bigger than me
Heavy track Description: my hometown most infectious and enthralling live band at the moment. can't do anything but shake my body on their music.

Light track Description: Cinematic, everything is possible ish, retro futurist, soothing. Heard it on the tv show the bear, felt in love with it <3 should be played on the morning to clear your mind and feel grounded
Heavy track Description: Fun in a playfull way. I was the biggest Indochine fan when I was a kid ðŸ¥¹ underated track

Light track Description: Morning, waking up, lazyness. JÃ©rÃ©mie introduced me this song through his Mixcloud radio show. It makes me feel that everything is going to be ok. Peace. It should be played while you cook your breakfast.
Heavy track Description: One of brazilian's 2025 best hit. I found it playing everywhere in the city. Every bar. It makes me feel happy, pround, wanting to dance and sing. It should be played in bars. Barbecue... where you can have a beer.

Light track Description: Was looking for references of tracks from underground producers that was supposed to be tribute to friends, just for inspiration
Heavy track Description: Not your usual banger track , but what I would call a "reverse-banger" ,  eccentric and off-killer acid techno that makes even the crazy go crazyer,
